name: @allmarkedup/fang
description: A tiny utility to get language information about a file.

scripts.lang:build: ruby -ryaml -rjson -e 'puts JSON.pretty_generate(YAML.load(ARGF))' < support/languages.yml > support/languages.json && node support/build.js

author: Mark Perkins <mark@allmarkedup.com> (http://allmarkedup.com)
